TopicTitle: Graphics BUG: Kerbonaut helmet clips outside of command module window

Articles.Content:
With the single-kerbal command module, the module is so small that the kerbonaut's helmet actually sticks out of the top of the module. In the screenshot, the white arrow visible in the porthole is actually the top of the EVA helmet clipping through the skin of the vessel.

https://steamcommunity.com/id/gorkwobbler/screenshot/2120691978805086714/
